H0.text: What was the name of George Stephenson's first railway locomotive, built in 1814. Salamanca

H1.text: What was the name of George Stephenson's first railway locomotive, built in 1814. Rocketeer

H2.text: What was the name of George Stephenson's first railway locomotive, built in 1814. Iron Horse

H3.text: What was the name of George Stephenson's first railway locomotive, built in 1814. Blucher

A4.text: Blücher was built by George Stephenson in 1814; the first of a series of locomotives that he designed in the period 1814–16 which established his reputation as an engine designer and laid the foundations for his subsequent pivotal role in the development of the railways.
